column1: Management with Tourism and Hospitality MSc
column5: A Masters in Management offers a wide and flexible range of options and is an excellent opportunity for those from a variety of backgrounds to acquire awareness and insight into professional management principles and practice.This course examines key issues concerning the structure and organisation of the tourism and hospitality sector, together with a critical analysis of major issues affecting the industry. Youâ€™ll develop the skills and knowledge for a career in a variety of global management roles.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
